full_text: The video is the main page for the medical details exposure. Eileen has received a call for a new workers compensation claim. She navigates to the new claim wizard. In the organization name search field, she enters George and clicks the search button. And the Georgetown roofing workers compensation policy is displayed. The incident occurred today. Eileen navigates to the basic information step of the wizard. The reporter is not in our records. The reporter is not in our records. So Eileen adds him. The reporter's first name is Richard. And his last name is Marin. Eileen saves the info. Mr. Marin works at Georgetown roofing. As a human resources specialist. As for the injured worker. He also is new to our records. His first name is Kim. His last name is Chung. And his social security number is 666-77-8888. Eileen saves and returns to the new claim wizard. And navigates to the lost details step. Here, she enters a description of what happened to Mr. Chung. of the Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. Which is a fairly severe occurrence. So Eileen marks it as of major severity. Due to his co-workers timely reaction, Mr. Chung is not dead. As for the cause or source of the injury, the best fit is miscellaneous causes. The primary injury type is specific injury as opposed to multiple injuries. And the specific type is vascular, as this incident involves the circulatory system. The area of the body affected. Is the trunk or torso. The specific body part affected by a heart attack. Is the heart. Mr. Chung will clearly lose a significant amount of time from work. He was taken to the emergency room and further medical attention will be required. This is all the information Eileen has at this time. On the final page of the new claim wizard. Eileen selects herself as the adjuster for this claim. This completes the creation of the new claim. Now Eileen navigates to the claim. And navigates to the medical details exposure. In the financials section, she can view the sum total reserves, payments, and recoveries associated with the medical details exposure. The coding section shows the details of how the exposure was segmented. The body parts section, drawing from the new claim wizard, lists the injured body parts, which is useful when the adjuster is not the same person who input the claim. The medical diagnosis section is always blank at first. A list will appear here showing the coded medical diagnoses provided by the injured workers medical team. There is also a list of activities specifically related to this exposure. In the base application, two activities are automatically generated upon creation of a medical details exposure, making contact with a medical provider, and getting the initial medical report. Of course, these activities are only part of the work plan for the whole claim. The base configuration has generated five additional activities, one associated with the indemnity exposure, and the other four associated with the claim itself. This concludes the medical details exposure demonstration.

In the organization name search field, she enters George and clicks the search button. And the Georgetown roofing workers compensation policy is displayed. The incident occurred today. Eileen navigates to the basic information step of the wizard.
